title: unspecified error please see logs for more information
body: just installed the league client and im at the page where it says The client update has begun and at the top it says step 1/1 upgrading your client. it goes to about 50-60% before popping up a message that says unspecified error please see logs for more information. im running on windows 7 ultimate 64x bit. i've already tried turning off my fire wall but the unspecified error still pops up.

replies.body: Once you get passed the 30% mark is when the patcher starts downloading and updating your game files. Most of the time, errors after that point are pretty good signs that something interrupted your connection with the patching servers. It can happen sometimes with specific servers, and doesn't mean your own internet is messing up. Let's take a moment to look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if something could be adjusted there to make it a little easier on your network during that patch!

Hi Mc,

Try these few steps:
1. Run the hextech repair tool located here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs 
2. If the above doesn't fix the problem find your r3d and client logs and create a support ticket with those logs attached. 
3. If they cannot help you - try reinstalling league (if they didn't already ask you).

What it looks like to me on first glance is the client is "hanging" and getting stuck.
